title: Garmin Epix Pro review: Should you buy it?
description: Three feature-packed sizes to choose from, for the goldilocks in all of us.

title: Don’t judge all of Android by the worst of Android
description: If you buy a $100 Android phone, you're going to have a bad time. That doesn't (and shouldn't) represent Android as a whole.

title: For the first time, I am excited about Sony’s WF-1000XM5 buds
description: A smaller size and a more ergonomic design are exactly what was missing from this formula.
